Articles.Content:
I want to put this baby through some test runs before I go to the trouble of launching it *legit*. Can't find the good ol' hack gravity in the cheats menu anymore though. Was it removed?

![mPGwDlj.png](http://i.imgur.com/mPGwDlj.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-08T15:44:09Z" title="07/08/2015 03:44  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 8, 2015</time> by Col\_Jessep**
It's still in the game but the option only appears in flight, you can't set it in the VAB/SPH.
Planning to oversee the completion of the battle station personally?
A TWR of 0.44? I find your lack of thrust disturbing.

> 
> A TWR of 0.44? I find your lack of thrust disturbing.

The ability to destroy a planet is insignificant next to the power of bending the laws of physics:

![XPGnSMJ.png](http://i.imgur.com/XPGnSMJ.png)

> 
> Planning to oversee the completion of the battle station personally?

Absolutely and Vader gets his own smaller version to move between the refueling station on Minmus and the Not A Moon:

![NEXLa3m.png](http://i.imgur.com/NEXLa3m.png)

The delta-v will be enough to travel almost anywhere in the Kerbol system I guess. The TWR is nothing to write home about again though.
